data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Maddison, Wayne P., Piascik, Edyta K. (2014): Jerzego, a new hisponine jumping spider from Borneo (Araneae: Salticidae). Zootaxa 3852 (5): 569-578, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3852.5.5
